scripts.initialize: (mysql -u root -proot@123 gfe_system_db < ./src/scripts/queries/db_schema.sql || mysqlsh -u root -proot@123 -f ./src/scripts/queries/db_schema.sql) && (echo DB has been initialized/reinitialized)
scripts.build:testing: shx rm -rf build && npx tsc && shx cp ./package* ./build/ && shx cp .testing.env ./build/.env && shx cp -r ./src/scripts ./build/src && shx cp -r ./pm2.config.js ./build/
scripts.build:development: shx rm -rf build && npx tsc && shx cp ./package* ./build/ && shx cp .development.env ./build/.env && shx cp -r ./src/scripts ./build/src && shx cp -r ./pm2.config.js ./build/
scripts.build:production: shx rm -rf build && npx tsc && shx cp ./package* ./build/ && shx cp .production.env ./build/.env && shx cp -r ./src/scripts ./build/src && shx cp -r ./pm2.config.js ./build/
scripts.build:aws: shx rm -rf build && npx tsc && shx cp ./package* ./build/ && shx cp .aws.env ./build/.env && shx cp -r ./src/scripts ./build/src && shx cp -r ./pm2.config.js ./build/
